zh-CN.AMBIGUOUS_PRESCRIPTION_RULE: 发药规则的匹配有歧义
zh-CN.AUTO_SUPPLY_SUGGESTION_FILLED: 这条自动供应建议已经实现
zh-CN.BAD_PACKAGE_DRUG_COUNT: 错误的包裹内药物数量
zh-CN.BLIND_OPERATION_DENIED: 盲态角色不能操作盲态数据
zh-CN.CANNOT_DELETE_EXECUTED_SIMULATION: 不能删除已执行的随机模拟
zh-CN.CANNOT_DISABLE_DISABLED_CONFIG: 不能作废已经作废的配置
zh-CN.CANNOT_ENABLE_ENABLED_CONFIG: 不能启用已经启用的配置
zh-CN.CANNOT_EXPORT_INCOMPLETE_SIMULATION: 无法导出未执行的随机模拟
zh-CN.CANNOT_OPERATE_BLIND_CODE_UNDER_ENABLED_: 不能修改已经启用的盲底配置
zh-CN.CANNOT_OPERATE_SIMULATION_UNDER_ENABLED_: 不能模拟已经启用的盲底配置
zh-CN.CANNOT_RUN_EXECUTED_SIMULATION: 无法执行已执行的随机模拟
zh-CN.CANNOT_SIMULATE_WITHOUT_SITE_SETTING: 缺乏中心设置，无法模拟随机
zh-CN.CANNOT_UPDATE_EXECUTED_SIMULATION: 无法修改已执行的随机模拟
zh-CN.CONFLICTS_WITH_EXISTING_PACKAGE_OID: 药物的包装OID和系统已有的包装OID冲突
zh-CN.CRF_HAS_NO_DISPENSING_FORM: 指定的CRF没有配置用于发药的访视和表单
zh-CN.DRUG_PACKED_IN_ORDER: 该药物编号已经被订单配货了，请先从订单配货状态中解除，再更新药物状态
zh-CN.FAILED_TO_COPY_CRF_DRUG_ESTIMATION: 无法复制用药数量配置
zh-CN.FAILED_TO_DIVIDE_ORDERINGS: 拆分药物需求失败。可能是自动供应中未配置动态模式，或者是在动态模式短窗期内没有查询到有效的受试者发药访视
zh-CN.FORBIDDEN_UNBLINDING_TYPE: 根据当前的揭盲状态，不允许此种揭盲操作
zh-CN.INVALID_DRUG_OR_PRESCRIPTION_CONFIG: 无效的药物或者药方配置
zh-CN.INVALID_DRUG_TEMPLATE_CONFIG_CODE: 无效药物配置盲态编码
zh-CN.INVALID_SHIPPING_SOURCE_OR_DESTINATION: 无效的物流发起方或者目标方
zh-CN.INVALID_SUBJECT_STATUS_EXCLUSIONS: 无效的受试者状态配置
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN: 无效的自动供应计划设置
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_DRUG_CODE: 自动供应计划设置中药物编码无效
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_INITIAL_REQUIREMENT: 自动供应计划设中库存初始值无效
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_MAX_MIN: 自动供应计划设置中上限值/下限值设置无效
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_SHORT_LONG_WINDOW: 自动供应计划设置中短期窗、长期窗设置无效
zh-CN.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_OID: 无效的自动供应计划设置OID
zh-CN.INVALID_TOTAL_SUBJECT_NUM: 无效的受试者数，受试者数超出盲底数
zh-CN.INVALID_WORKFLOW_DEFINITION: 无效的订单工作流定义
zh-CN.INVALID_WORKFLOW_TYPE: 无效的订单工作流类型
zh-CN.MISSING_CONTROL_STUDY_CONFIG: 缺少Control配置。请确认是否已经在研究通用配置内为本试验启用产品Control。
zh-CN.NOT_ENOUGH_DRUGS: 中心、药房或者仓库没有足够的药品
zh-CN.NOT_FOUND_DISPENSING_RULE: 无法找到合适的发药规则。请检查CRF配置和部署。
zh-CN.NOT_FOUND_DRUG_AUTO_SUPPLY_CONFIG: 药物自动供应配置未设置
zh-CN.NOT_FOUND_STUDY_ENV_DRUG_DEF: 无法找当前环境的药物配置, 联系相关人员添加对应信息
zh-CN.NOT_FOUND_STUDY_ENV_SITE_DEPOT: 无法找到对应中心和药房的关系, 联系相关人员添加对应信息
zh-CN.RETURN_ORDER_USES_KIT_SPEC_PACKING: 返回订单通过最小包装打包
zh-CN.STRATUM_MUST_BE_EMPTY: 依据随机设置，盲底内分层字段必须留空
zh-CN.SUPPLY_PLAN_IN_USE: 自动供应模板正在被药房/库房使用
zh-CN.SOURCE_ENV_HAS_NO_ACCESSIBLE_DEPOT: 源环境没有可以访问的药房
zh-CN.TARGET_ENV_HAS_NO_ACCESSIBLE_DEPOT: 目标环境没有可以访问的药房
zh-CN.USER_LOCKED: 因为多次输入错误，您的帐号已被锁定，请5分钟后再试

en-US.AUTO_SUPPLY_SUGGESTION_FILLED: This auto supply suggestion has been filled.
en-US.BLIND_DATA_ACCESS_DENIED: Access is denied due to blind setup
en-US.BLIND_OPERATION_DENIED: Blind role can't operate on blind data.
en-US.CANNOT_RUN_EXECUTED_SIMULATION: Cannot execute randomization simulations that have already been executed
en-US.CANNOT_SIMULATE_WITHOUT_SITE_SETTING: Cannot simulate randomization due to lack of site settings
en-US.CONFLICTS_WITH_EXISTING_PACKAGE_OID: The new drug package oid conflicts with existing package oid
en-US.CRF_HAS_NO_DISPENSING_FORM: The specified CRF has no visit/form for drug dispensing
en-US.DEPOT_AUTO_SUPPLY_NOT_ENABLED: The auto supply plan in depot is not enabled
en-US.DEPOT_AUTO_SUPPLY_NOT_DEPLOYED: The auto supply plan in depot is not deployed
en-US.DRUG_PACKED_IN_ORDER: The drug is packed in an order, please remove it from the order to update the status
en-US.DUPLICATED_SUBJECT_BLINDING_BLOCK_OID: Duplicated subject blinding code block OID
en-US.FAILED_TO_COPY_CRF_DRUG_ESTIMATION: Failed to copy the CRF Drug Estimation
en-US.FAILED_TO_DIVIDE_ORDERINGS: Failed to divide the drug ordrings. It may be caused by the absense of auto-supply config, or there are no subjects in the auto-supply short-window config.
en-US.FORBIDDEN_UNBLINDING_TYPE: Forbidden unblinding type in the current status
en-US.INVALID_SECONDARY_PACKAGE_DEF: Invalid secondary package def in study config
en-US.INVALID_SECONDARY_PACKAGE_NAME: Invalid secondary package name in study config
en-US.INVALID_SUBJECT_BLOCK_SIZE: Invalid subject blind code block size
en-US.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_DRUG_CODE: Invalid drug code of supply plan
en-US.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_INITIAL_REQUIREMENT: Invalid initial requirement of supply plan
en-US.INVALID_SUPPLY_PLAN_SHORT_LONG_WINDOW: Invalid short/long window of supply plan
en-US.INVALID_TOTAL_SUBJECT_NUM: Invalid number of subjects, which exceeds that of blind codes
en-US.MISSING_CONTROL_STUDY_CONFIG: Missing control study config. Please confirm if APP Control is enabled in Study Generic Settings.
en-US.MISSING_SUBJECT_BLIND_CODE_OID: OID of subject blind code is required
en-US.NOT_FOUND_DISPENSING_RULE: Cannot find dispensing rule. Is the CRF well configured and deployed?
en-US.NOT_FOUND_STUDY_ENV_DRUG_DEF: Cannot find drug settings in the current environment. Please contact your study administrator.
en-US.NOT_FOUND_STUDY_ENV_SITE_DEPOT: Cannot find depot associated with the site. Please contact your study administrator.
en-US.RETURN_ORDER_USES_KIT_SPEC_PACKING: Returning order uses packing by a single drug kit
en-US.STRATUM_MUST_BE_EMPTY: Stratum must be empty for this type of randomization
en-US.SUPPLY_PLAN_IN_USE: The supply plan was deployed and is used by some depots.
en-US.SOURCE_ENV_HAS_NO_ACCESSIBLE_DEPOT: The source env has no depot accessible
en-US.TARGET_ENV_HAS_NO_ACCESSIBLE_DEPOT: The target env has no depot accessible
en-US.UNDEFINED_PROJECT_FILE_TEMPLATE: The project file template is not defined yet.
en-US.USER_LOCKED: Your account has been locked due to too many entry errors. Please try again in 5 minutes.
